entry.title: The Prince & The Pauper
entry.summary:
Author: plotcole (Quint_Essentially)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 38,297Chapters: 7/26Kudos: 15

Summary: Extract from ‘Knights of the Temples: The Prince Arthur Story’ by T. H. Blanc, published 2021: 'There we have it. Violence, intrigue, danger, romance, and self-sacrifice. In a couple of short months, Captain Arthur Pendragon, eldest son of The Most Honourable The Marquess of Camelot, Lord Uther Pendragon, almost singlehandedly dismantled one of the most covert and sinister arms of the Axis Powers’ military forces, ensuring that its leader and the secret weapons she had designed would never again see the light of day. ' OR: The story of a young nobleman who couldn't stand by when his country needed him, and his loyal companion who would follow Arthur to the very ends of the Earth if he had to.

entry.title: King & Court
entry.summary:
Author: BeautifulFiction

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 247,846Chapters: 54/100Kudos: 2,574

Summary: Loneliness is an insidious thing. When Merlin looks at Arthur, he sees not just a prince waiting for his time to rule, but a young man struggling to find his place in the world, with little help from anyone else.The truth is, Arthur needs more than the friendship Merlin can offer. He needs people he can trust: men and women who will become his court and his confidants, and if he is going to survive to take the throne and lead Camelot into its golden age, he needs them sooner rather than later.Finding loopholes in Uther’s laws is no easy feat. Court life is a dangerous game, but it’s one Merlin has every intention of winning so that Arthur can have knights of his choosing by his side.And then there is the matter of his magic…

entry.title: not too unfamiliar
entry.summary:
Author: paladinstormblessed

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,775Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 153

Summary: This fic began as a re-write of the confrontation scene in S2 E1 between Merlin and Cedric, with the detail that Arthur was conscious (debatable) and overheard their entire conversation. What better way is there to find out your best friend is a sorcerer? Following chapters expand on the episodes after that, and how things might be a bit different if Arthur discovered Merlin's magic, without Merlin knowing.

entry.title: Losing or gaining control (is sometimes closer to each other than you think)
entry.summary:
Author: sword_and_shield_22

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 166,948Chapters: 39/58Kudos: 141

Summary: Merlin has never learnt to control his magic. It is completely guided by his emotions and that usually doesn't turn out well.Arthur was chased out of Camelot as a young prince. His own sister killed their father and now he is just waiting for the right moment to reclaim his kingdom.When Merlin and Arthur meet, a hope seems to take root in the world that all will be well.Magical figures, dark magic, lies and betrayal make their experiences together anything but easy. But deep friendships, trust, loyalty and love bring them ever closer to their goal.Will Merlin find the control he needs and can Arthur forget his past to open his heart?

entry.title: Wake Me Up When You’re Reincarnated (when I'm wiser and I'm older)
entry.summary:
Author: unrealisticdreamer101

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 21,118Chapters: 13/?Kudos: 53

Summary: Arthur died. Merlin didn’t. (Unfortunately). Fifteen centuries later, Merlin’s still alive—older, grumpier, and done with humanity. Then Arthur returns, reborn as a rich, distractible golden retriever of a man. His enemies? Reincarnated too. Arthur’s memory? Gone. Kings are out, influencers are in. So Merlin becomes a kid (long story), grows up with Arthur (longer story), and ends up his manager (don’t ask). Reincarnation, reluctant friendship (maybe romance, very salacious), and one exhausted wizard trying to stop destiny from falling apart—again. Includes some of Merlin's life before Arthur's return because history and travelling to other countries in history is really fun to write. I update when I update :) SPOILER:The romance only starts after Arthur's memories return.

entry.title: Different Destiny: The Outlaw Prince
entry.summary:
Author: tansyuduri

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,793Chapters: 2/25Kudos: 25

Summary: When Merlin's magic is exposed shortly before season 2 starts, the path of destiny starts changing forever. Now on the run with Arthur, Morgana, and Gwen. Merlin hopes to convince Arthur that magic is totally good instead of him and Morgana just being an exception. Morgana, meanwhile, hopes to convince him to usurp his father. As allies are gathered and Arthur realizes the injustice in his kingdom, it looks more and more like he will have to act in a drastic way. A way he dreads.   Meanwhile, Arthur and Merlin are growing closer and closer and might just have feelings for each other. Something they probably should be better about realizing, considering the example of Gwen and Morgana right next to them.   In a land of myth and a time of magic, the destiny of a great kingdom now rests on the shoulders of four, their names: Merlin, Arthur, Guinevere, and Morgana

entry.summary:
Author: NephriteJade

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 37,217Chapters: 20/66Kudos: 40

Summary: In an Albion where the oceans are higher, where Camelot is a port city and pirates plague the seas, Prince Arthur Pendragon struggles under the weight of his duty and his doubts. For almost twenty years he's honed himself to become the sword his father wants him to be, but he's begun to wonder if a ruler relying too much on the sword is more dangerous to his people than any foe.Meanwhile Lady Morgana can no longer avoid the shadows that plague her in her waking hours as well as her dreams, and resolves to save herself from exhaustion and madness. But searching for forbidden knowledge in Camelot can be deadly, even for the king's ward.And Merlin, the prince's manservant, holds more secrets than either of them. Between trying to free the dragon under the castle, protecting Arthur from magical threats that Camelot is no longer capable of grappling with, and keeping his head attached to his shoulders, he can barely keep up with his life as it is. Throwing in prophecies is just excessive.This is a story carried by many hands, because in a land of myth and a time of magic, the destiny of a great kingdom can't be shouldered by any one person alone.

entry.title: ...How to be not straight (for very good reasons)
entry.summary:
Author: SueRose

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,335Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 5

Summary: Rich nepo boy Arthur Pendragon joins his university's queer club. And pretends to be queer, because he needs to write a paper about queer representation. But.... He has not expected this. This being the leader of the club, namely Merlins Emrys, who does not believe a word he says. Will he be able to appear queer enough to his new peers? Or will all.of this end up in a giant disaster?

entry.title: come into my bedroom (baby, tell me what you need)
entry.summary:
Author: cannibalcrow

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,271Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 24

Summary: “A’thur?” Merlin mumbles, eyes slipping open to reveal a blue that mixes perfectly with the silver light filtering the bedroom. “Sorry, I didn't mean to wake you,” Arthur whispers. “It’s alright,” Merlin mumbles. He quickly awakens, thoughts rather than tiredness tumbling in his eyes. Merlin stares and Arthur lets him, knows what will come out of it; the reminder that he has someone who knows him, every real and pure inch, every ugly and mean part. The trace of Merlin's focus presents itself on Arthur's body like a brush on a canvas. It’s smooth and all encompassing, bristles only meant to color a plain background, to bring life to it. When Merlin speaks again his voice is wise and somewhere amused, fond. “Has your mind sneaked up on your mood again?" Their forearms lay next to one another in the small space that separates them, their fingers brushing together but not yet tangled. Arthur keeps his eyes pointed on them when he answers. “You know me far too well, Merlin. Have you any idiocy anymore?” Or When Arthur is struggling in his own mind, he seeks out Merlin, who brings him back to himself.

entry.title: a hollow legacy
entry.summary:
Author: insane_falcon

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,043Chapters: 1/2Kudos: 0

Summary: A simple missing person's case takes a turn for the deadly when Private Investigator Merlin Wyllt stumbles across the corpse of the woman he was supposed to find—and Detective Inspector Arthur Pendragon accuses him of her murder and the several others that have occurred across Londinium. Though his name is quickly cleared, Merlin keeps getting thrown together with Arthur while in pursuit of the real murderer, and quickly they learn two heads are better than one. And after a bone-chilling discovery, they'll need every advantage they can get to stop the storm brewing on the horizon, ready to leave total annihilation in its wake.
